text: Phyllanthus pavonianus, synonym Phyllanthus haughtii, is a species of plant in the family Phyllanthaceae. It is native from south Ecuador to north-west Peru. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. Under the synonym Phyllanthus haughtii, it has been regarded as "endangered". ==References== Category:Flora of Ecuador Category:Flora of Peru pavonianus Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Henri Ernest Baillon
title: Phyllanthus pavonianus
